In 500 Grands Prix we've seen so many stories unfold 🙌

In #GP500 this weekend at COTA, who do you think will take victory? 🤔

#AmericasGP 🇺🇸

GP 400 - Brno 2016 🇨🇿

Wet tyres, a drying track, a gutsy @calcrutchlow. That's a recipe for success. The 400th race saw the # 35 take a British rider back to the top step of the premier class podium for the first time in 35 years. Sometimes the numbers just add up 🇬🇧🏆

#GP500 https://t.co/TAnXxfGI4H

GP 300 - Qatar 2011 🇶🇦

Without doubt one of the most talented motorcycle racers to ever grace our sport. The great @Official_CS27 took victory in the 300th race under the lights in Qatar 👏

#GP500 https://t.co/NH6Zy1notz

GP 200 - Catalunya 2005 🏁

A more iconic figure in motorcycle racing there is not. @ValeYellow46 took victory in the 200th race as he dominated the dawn of the four strokes in #MotoGP 🏆

#GP500 https://t.co/rjcPPUmQ5g

GP 100 - Motegi 1999 🇯🇵 

The 100th race of the Racing Together era was also in Japan, but this time it was at Motegi! Kenny Roberts Jr took victory and would later go on to finish 2nd overall in 1999 before becoming World Champion the following year 🙌

#GP500 https://t.co/BfeI4r9Esx

GP 1 - Suzuka 1992 🇯🇵

The Racing Together era kicked into life in soaking conditions in Japan with Mick Doohan taking victory 🏆

#GP500 https://t.co/z0HppKi8AO
